name: Sunrise Tofu Scramble
ingredients: 1 block tofu|1/2 tsp turmeric|1/4 cup nutritional yeast|salt|pepper|1 tbsp olive oil
instructions: 1. Crumble tofu into a heated pan. 2. Add turmeric, salt, and pepper. 3. Cook until heated through, stirring in nutritional yeast at the end.

name: Hearty Oatmeal Bowl
ingredients: 1/2 cup rolled oats|1 cup water or plant milk|1 tbsp maple syrup|1/4 cup berries|1 tbsp chia seeds
instructions: 1. Bring water/milk to a boil. 2. Stir in oats and reduce heat. 3. Cook for 5-7 minutes, then top with syrup, berries, and chia seeds.

name: Simple Avocado Toast
ingredients: 2 slices whole-grain bread|1 ripe avocado|1 pinch red pepper flakes|salt and pepper to taste
instructions: 1. Toast the bread to your liking. 2. Mash the avocado and spread it on the toast. 3. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.

name: Fresh Lentil Soup
ingredients: 1 cup brown lentils|6 cups vegetable broth|1 onion
instructions: chopped|2 carrots
carbs: 1. Sauté onion, carrots, and celery in a large pot. 2. Add lentils and vegetable broth. 3. Bring to a boil, then simmer for 25-30 minutes until lentils are tender.

name: Zesty Quinoa Salad
ingredients: 1 cup quinoa|2 cups water|1 can (15 oz) chickpeas
instructions: rinsed|1 cucumber
carbs: 1. Cook quinoa according to package directions and let cool. 2. In a large bowl, combine quinoa, chickpeas, cucumber, and bell pepper. 3. Toss with a lemon vinaigrette.

name: Classic Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil|1 onion
instructions: chopped|8 oz cremini mushrooms
category: sliced|1 1/2 cups Arborio rice|4 cups vegetable broth
carbs: 1. Sauté onion and mushrooms until soft. 2. Add Arborio rice and toast for 1 minute. 3. Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring continuously until absorbed before adding the next.

name: Cozy Black Bean Curry
ingredients: 1 tbsp coconut oil|1 onion
instructions: chopped|2 cloves garlic
carbs: 1. Sauté onion and garlic in coconut oil. 2. Stir in spices, then add black beans and coconut milk. 3. Simmer for 15-20 minutes. Serve with rice.

name: Morning Egg Scramble
ingredients: 3 large eggs|2 tbsp milk|1 tbsp butter|salt
instructions: pepper
calories: 1. Whisk eggs and milk together. 2. Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. 3. Pour in egg mixture and cook, stirring occasionally, until cooked to your liking.

name: Healthy Greek Yogurt Parfait
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt|1/2 cup granola|1/2 cup mixed berries|1 tbsp honey
instructions: 1. Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass. 2. Drizzle with honey before serving.

name: Sunrise Pancakes
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour|2 tbsp sugar|1 3/4 tsp baking powder|1 egg|1 1/4 cups milk
instructions: 1. Whisk together dry ingredients. 2. In a separate bowl, whisk egg and milk. 3. Combine wet and dry ingredients, then cook on a hot griddle.

name: Power Caprese Salad
ingredients: 8 oz fresh mozzarella
instructions: sliced|2 large tomatoes
category: sliced|Fresh basil leaves|2 tbsp balsamic glaze
calories: 1. Arrange alternating slices of mozzarella and tomato on a platter. 2. Tuck basil leaves in between. 3. Drizzle with balsamic glaze right before serving.

name: Simple Four Cheese Pasta
ingredients: 1 lb pasta|1 jar Alfredo sauce|1/2 cup shredded mozzarella|1/4 cup grated Parmesan|1/4 cup crumbled Gorgonzola
instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package directions. 2. Heat Alfredo sauce in a saucepan. 3. Drain pasta and toss with sauce and cheeses until melted and combined.

name: Elegant Eggplant Parmesan
ingredients: 1 large eggplant
instructions: sliced|2 eggs
category: beaten|1 cup breadcrumbs|1 jar marinara sauce|1 cup shredded mozzarella
calories: 1. Dip eggplant slices in egg, then coat with breadcrumbs. 2. Fry slices until golden brown. 3. Layer fried eggplant, marinara sauce, and mozzarella in a baking dish. Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.

name: Family Spinach Lasagna
ingredients: 9 lasagna noodles
instructions: cooked|1 (15 oz) container ricotta cheese|1 egg|1/4 cup Parmesan cheese|10 oz frozen spinach
calories: 1. Mix ricotta, egg, Parmesan, and spinach. 2. Layer noodles, ricotta mixture, and marinara sauce in a baking dish. 3. Top with mozzarella and bake at 375°F for 30-40 minutes.

name: Quick Bacon and Eggs
ingredients: 4 strips bacon|2 large eggs|salt and pepper to taste
instructions: 1. Cook bacon in a skillet until crispy. Remove bacon and drain most of the fat. 2. Crack eggs into the same skillet and cook to your preference.

name: Hearty Sausage Patties
ingredients: 1 lb ground pork sausage|1 tsp sage|1/2 tsp black pepper|1/4 tsp salt
instructions: 1. Combine sausage with sage, pepper, and salt. 2. Form into small patties. 3. Cook in a skillet over medium-high heat until browned and cooked through.

name: Zesty Chicken Salad Sandwich
ingredients: 2 cups shredded cooked chicken|1/2 cup mayonnaise|1/4 cup chopped celery|2 tbsp chopped red onion
instructions: 1. Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix well. 2. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 3. Serve on bread or with crackers.

name: Classic Tuna Melt
ingredients: 1 can (5 oz) tuna
instructions: drained|1/4 cup mayonnaise|2 tbsp chopped pickles|4 slices bread|2 slices cheddar cheese
category: 1. Mix tuna, mayonnaise, and pickles. 2. Spread mixture on two slices of bread. Top with cheese and the other two slices of bread. 3. Grill in a buttered skillet until golden brown.

name: Cozy Roast Chicken
ingredients: 1 whole chicken (3-4 lbs)|1 tbsp olive oil|1 tsp salt|1/2 tsp pepper|1 lemon
instructions: halved
category: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. 2. Rub chicken with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Place lemon halves inside the cavity. 3. Roast for 60-75 minutes, or until juices run clear.

name: Elegant Steak with Potatoes
ingredients: 2 beef sirloin steaks|1 lb baby potatoes
instructions: halved|2 tbsp olive oil|salt and pepper
category: 1. Toss potatoes with 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast at 400°F for 20-25 minutes. 2. Season steaks and pan-sear in a hot skillet for 3-5 minutes per side.

instructions: drained|1/4 cup mayonnaise|2 tbsp chopped pickles|4 slices bread|2 slices cheddar cheese
category: 1. Mix tuna, mayonnaise, and pickles. 2. Spread mixture on two slices of bread. Top with cheese and the other two slices of bread. 3. Grill in a buttered skillet until golden brown.

name: Family Roast Chicken
ingredients: 1 whole chicken (3-4 lbs)|1 tbsp olive oil|1 tsp salt|1/2 tsp pepper|1 lemon
instructions: halved
category: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. 2. Rub chicken with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Place lemon halves inside the cavity. 3. Roast for 60-75 minutes, or until juices run clear.

name: Spicy Steak with Potatoes
ingredients: 2 beef sirloin steaks|1 lb baby potatoes
instructions: halved|2 tbsp olive oil|salt and pepper
category: 1. Toss potatoes with 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast at 400°F for 20-25 minutes. 2. Season steaks and pan-sear in a hot skillet for 3-5 minutes per side.

name: name
ingredients: ingredients
instructions: instructions

name: Sunrise Tofu Scramble
ingredients: 1 block tofu|1/2 tsp turmeric|1/4 cup nutritional yeast|salt|pepper|1 tbsp olive oil
instructions: 1. Crumble tofu into a heated pan. 2. Add turmeric, salt, and pepper. 3. Cook until heated through, stirring in nutritional yeast at the end.

name: Hearty Oatmeal Bowl
ingredients: 1/2 cup rolled oats|1 cup water or plant milk|1 tbsp maple syrup|1/4 cup berries|1 tbsp chia seeds
instructions: 1. Bring water/milk to a boil. 2. Stir in oats and reduce heat. 3. Cook for 5-7 minutes, then top with syrup, berries, and chia seeds.

name: Quick Avocado Toast
ingredients: 2 slices whole-grain bread|1 ripe avocado|1 pinch red pepper flakes|salt and pepper to taste
instructions: 1. Toast the bread to your liking. 2. Mash the avocado and spread it on the toast. 3. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.

name: Power Lentil Soup
ingredients: 1 cup brown lentils|6 cups vegetable broth|1 onion
instructions: chopped|2 carrots
carbs: 1. Sauté onion, carrots, and celery in a large pot. 2. Add lentils and vegetable broth. 3. Bring to a boil, then simmer for 25-30 minutes until lentils are tender.

name: Simple Quinoa Salad
ingredients: 1 cup quinoa|2 cups water|1 can (15 oz) chickpeas
instructions: rinsed|1 cucumber
carbs: 1. Cook quinoa according to package directions and let cool. 2. In a large bowl, combine quinoa, chickpeas, cucumber, and bell pepper. 3. Toss with a lemon vinaigrette.

name: Family Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil|1 onion
instructions: chopped|8 oz cremini mushrooms
category: sliced|1 1/2 cups Arborio rice|4 cups vegetable broth
carbs: 1. Sauté onion and mushrooms until soft. 2. Add Arborio rice and toast for 1 minute. 3. Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring continuously until absorbed before adding the next.

name: Classic Black Bean Curry
ingredients: 1 tbsp coconut oil|1 onion
instructions: chopped|2 cloves garlic
carbs: 1. Sauté onion and garlic in coconut oil. 2. Stir in spices, then add black beans and coconut milk. 3. Simmer for 15-20 minutes. Serve with rice.

name: Quick Egg Scramble
ingredients: 3 large eggs|2 tbsp milk|1 tbsp butter|salt
instructions: pepper
calories: 1. Whisk eggs and milk together. 2. Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. 3. Pour in egg mixture and cook, stirring occasionally, until cooked to your liking.

name: Healthy Greek Yogurt Parfait
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt|1/2 cup granola|1/2 cup mixed berries|1 tbsp honey
instructions: 1. Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass. 2. Drizzle with honey before serving.

name: Morning Pancakes
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour|2 tbsp sugar|1 3/4 tsp baking powder|1 egg|1 1/4 cups milk
instructions: 1. Whisk together dry ingredients. 2. In a separate bowl, whisk egg and milk. 3. Combine wet and dry ingredients, then cook on a hot griddle.

name: Simple Caprese Salad
ingredients: 8 oz fresh mozzarella
instructions: sliced|2 large tomatoes
category: sliced|Fresh basil leaves|2 tbsp balsamic glaze
calories: 1. Arrange alternating slices of mozzarella and tomato on a platter. 2. Tuck basil leaves in between. 3. Drizzle with balsamic glaze right before serving.

name: Fresh Four Cheese Pasta
ingredients: 1 lb pasta|1 jar Alfredo sauce|1/2 cup shredded mozzarella|1/4 cup grated Parmesan|1/4 cup crumbled Gorgonzola
instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package directions. 2. Heat Alfredo sauce in a saucepan. 3. Drain pasta and toss with sauce and cheeses until melted and combined.

name: Family Eggplant Parmesan
ingredients: 1 large eggplant
instructions: sliced|2 eggs
category: beaten|1 cup breadcrumbs|1 jar marinara sauce|1 cup shredded mozzarella
calories: 1. Dip eggplant slices in egg, then coat with breadcrumbs. 2. Fry slices until golden brown. 3. Layer fried eggplant, marinara sauce, and mozzarella in a baking dish. Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.

name: Cozy Spinach Lasagna
ingredients: 9 lasagna noodles
instructions: cooked|1 (15 oz) container ricotta cheese|1 egg|1/4 cup Parmesan cheese|10 oz frozen spinach
calories: 1. Mix ricotta, egg, Parmesan, and spinach. 2. Layer noodles, ricotta mixture, and marinara sauce in a baking dish. 3. Top with mozzarella and bake at 375°F for 30-40 minutes.

name: Quick Bacon and Eggs
ingredients: 4 strips bacon|2 large eggs|salt and pepper to taste
instructions: 1. Cook bacon in a skillet until crispy. Remove bacon and drain most of the fat. 2. Crack eggs into the same skillet and cook to your preference.

name: Hearty Sausage Patties
ingredients: 1 lb ground pork sausage|1 tsp sage|1/2 tsp black pepper|1/4 tsp salt
instructions: 1. Combine sausage with sage, pepper, and salt. 2. Form into small patties. 3. Cook in a skillet over medium-high heat until browned and cooked through.

name: Power Chicken Salad Sandwich
ingredients: 2 cups shredded cooked chicken|1/2 cup mayonnaise|1/4 cup chopped celery|2 tbsp chopped red onion
instructions: 1. Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix well. 2. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 3. Serve on bread or with crackers.

category: 1. Toss potatoes with 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast at 400°F for 20-25 minutes. 2. Season steaks and pan-sear in a hot skillet for 3-5 minutes per side.

calories: 1. Whisk eggs and milk together. 2. Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. 3. Pour in egg mixture and cook, stirring occasionally, until cooked to your liking.

name: Healthy Greek Yogurt Parfait
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt|1/2 cup granola|1/2 cup mixed berries|1 tbsp honey
instructions: 1. Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass. 2. Drizzle with honey before serving.

name: Morning Pancakes
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour|2 tbsp sugar|1 3/4 tsp baking powder|1 egg|1 1/4 cups milk
instructions: 1. Whisk together dry ingredients. 2. In a separate bowl, whisk egg and milk. 3. Combine wet and dry ingredients, then cook on a hot griddle.

name: Simple Caprese Salad
ingredients: 8 oz fresh mozzarella
instructions: sliced|2 large tomatoes
category: sliced|Fresh basil leaves|2 tbsp balsamic glaze
calories: 1. Arrange alternating slices of mozzarella and tomato on a platter. 2. Tuck basil leaves in between. 3. Drizzle with balsamic glaze right before serving.

name: Fresh Four Cheese Pasta
ingredients: 1 lb pasta|1 jar Alfredo sauce|1/2 cup shredded mozzarella|1/4 cup grated Parmesan|1/4 cup crumbled Gorgonzola
instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package directions. 2. Heat Alfredo sauce in a saucepan. 3. Drain pasta and toss with sauce and cheeses until melted and combined.

name: Family Eggplant Parmesan
ingredients: 1 large eggplant
instructions: sliced|2 eggs
category: beaten|1 cup breadcrumbs|1 jar marinara sauce|1 cup shredded mozzarella
calories: 1. Dip eggplant slices in egg, then coat with breadcrumbs. 2. Fry slices until golden brown. 3. Layer fried eggplant, marinara sauce, and mozzarella in a baking dish. Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.

name: Cozy Spinach Lasagna
ingredients: 9 lasagna noodles
instructions: cooked|1 (15 oz) container ricotta cheese|1 egg|1/4 cup Parmesan cheese|10 oz frozen spinach
calories: 1. Mix ricotta, egg, Parmesan, and spinach. 2. Layer noodles, ricotta mixture, and marinara sauce in a baking dish. 3. Top with mozzarella and bake at 375°F for 30-40 minutes.

name: Quick Bacon and Eggs
ingredients: 4 strips bacon|2 large eggs|salt and pepper to taste
instructions: 1. Cook bacon in a skillet until crispy. Remove bacon and drain most of the fat. 2. Crack eggs into the same skillet and cook to your preference.

name: Hearty Sausage Patties
ingredients: 1 lb ground pork sausage|1 tsp sage|1/2 tsp black pepper|1/4 tsp salt
instructions: 1. Combine sausage with sage, pepper, and salt. 2. Form into small patties. 3. Cook in a skillet over medium-high heat until browned and cooked through.

name: Power Chicken Salad Sandwich
ingredients: 2 cups shredded cooked chicken|1/2 cup mayonnaise|1/4 cup chopped celery|2 tbsp chopped red onion
instructions: 1. Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix well. 2. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 3. Serve on bread or with crackers.

name: Elegant Tuna Melt
ingredients: 1 can (5 oz) tuna
instructions: drained|1/4 cup mayonnaise|2 tbsp chopped pickles|4 slices bread|2 slices cheddar cheese
category: 1. Mix tuna, mayonnaise, and pickles. 2. Spread mixture on two slices of bread. Top with cheese and the other two slices of bread. 3. Grill in a buttered skillet until golden brown.

name: Family Roast Chicken
ingredients: 1 whole chicken (3-4 lbs)|1 tbsp olive oil|1 tsp salt|1/2 tsp pepper|1 lemon
instructions: halved
category: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F. 2. Rub chicken with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Place lemon halves inside the cavity. 3. Roast for 60-75 minutes, or until juices run clear.

name: Spicy Steak with Potatoes
ingredients: 2 beef sirloin steaks|1 lb baby potatoes
instructions: halved|2 tbsp olive oil|salt and pepper
category: 1. Toss potatoes with 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast at 400°F for 20-25 minutes. 2. Season steaks and pan-sear in a hot skillet for 3-5 minutes per side.
